name: .~HM File Extension
summary: Learn about .~HM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup of a TestList (.HML) file created with HostMonitor, a server monitoring program; contains a list of servers and monitoring tasks; saved as a backup in case the original HML file becomes corrupted or is accidentally deleted.
